title.narrative: RBM stöd till Manusher Jonno Foundation
RBM support for Manusher Jonno Foundation

description.narrative: Objectives of the intervention linked to the Manusher Jonno Foundation program The purpose of this intervention has been to strengthen the result framework at Manusher Jonno Foundation (UM2016/10282, ID: 52170021). The aim is to produce two central Project documents: 1) The Theory of Change and, 2) the Result Framework. Sida through the Embassy of Sweden procured NIRAS Indevelop (Ramavtal), to lead the work together with Manusher Jonno Foundation. To achieve the results workshops, interviews and meetings took place during 2017 with Manusher Jonno Foundation and the organizations linked to the program.

Syftet med avropet är att i enlighet med avtal med Sidas Partner Manusher Jonno Foundation erbjuda expertstöd till MJF i färdigställande av förändringsteori och resultatramverk för projektet "Strengthen civil society and public institutions to address combating gender based violence and build community resilience to adopt climate change."
Uppdragsbeskrivningen och NIRAS Indevelops svar på avrop och uppdragsbeskrivning för uppdraget bifogas detta beslut.

The purpose of this call-off is to, in agreement with Sida's agreement with partner Manusher Jonno Foundation offer expertise for the completion of the Theory of Change and Result Framework for Project "Strengthen civil society and public institutions to address combating gender based violence and build community resilience to adopt climate change."
Terms of Reference and response to call off and ToR from NIRAS Indevelop for Assignment is attached to this decision.

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: This was a consultants job, with the goal to deliver two project documents 1) A Theory of Change, 2) A Result Framework. The work was conducted by NIRAS Indevelop, and supported the ongoing intervention ID 52170021: "Strengthen Civil Society Institutions to address combating gender based violence and build community resilience to adopt climate change", implemented by Manusher Jonno Foundation. (Case File: UM2016/10282/DHAK). In the beginning of the mission, the consultants, Manusher Jonno Foundation and the Embassy of Sweden in Dhaka found out that there was a need for a statistical platform to be able to perform the two documents. Therefore two baseline studies were conducted parallel to this work. Due to need of more time, the agreement were prolonged to end of February 2018. NIRAS managed to deliver the two main documents for their mission to Manusher Jonno Foundation, and the Embassy of Sweden in Dhaka approved the documents late in October 2017 when they were submitted by the Bangladeshi partner. In the approval, the Embassy stressed that the Result Framework should be updated regularly. A Mid-term Review will be performed in 2019 which will give the program team an opportunity to profoundly update of the framework.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
